verses.verse: For <WH3117>, behold, the day cometh<WH935>, it burneth<WH1197> as a furnace<WH8574>; and all the proud<WH2086>, and all that work<WH6213> wickedness<WH7564>, shall be stubble<WH7179>; and the day<WH3117> that cometh<WH935> shall burn them up<WH3857>, saith<WH559> Jehovah<WH3068> of hosts<WH6635>, that it shall leave<WH5800> them neither root<WH8328> nor branch<WH6057>.

But unto you that fear<WH3373> my name<WH8034> shall the sun<WH8121> of righteousness<WH6666> arise<WH2224> with healing<WH4832> in its wings<WH3671>; and ye shall go forth<WH3318>, and gambol<WH6335> as calves<WH5695> of the stall<WH4770>.

And ye shall tread down<WH6072> the wicked<WH7563>; for they shall be ashes<WH665> under the soles<WH3709> of your feet<WH7272> in the day<WH3117> that I make<WH6213>, saith<WH559> Jehovah<WH3068> of hosts<WH6635>.
Remember <WH2142> ye the law<WH8451> of Moses<WH4872> my servant<WH5650>, which I commanded<WH6680> unto him in Horeb<WH2722> for all Israel<WH3478>, even statutes<WH2706> and ordinances<WH4941>.
Behold <WH7971>, I will send you Elijah<WH452> the prophet<WH5030> before<WH6440> the great<WH1419> and terrible<WH3372> day<WH3117> of Jehovah<WH3068> come<WH935>.

And he shall turn<WH7725> the heart<WH3820> of the fathers<WH1> to the children<WH1121>, and the heart<WH3820> of the children<WH1121> to their fathers<WH1>; lest I come<WH935> and smite<WH5221> the earth<WH776> with a curse<WH2764>.
